parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs.

parameters.name: ConnectionTimeout
parameters.description: The duration for which the prefetch connection is maintained. Unit: milliseconds. Default value: 0, which specifies that the prefetch connection is always maintained.

parameters.name: MediaTimeout
parameters.description: The custom period after which a timeout event is triggered. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: RegionCode
parameters.description:
The code of the region in which the live stream is prefetched. For more information, see the following tables that list available region codes.

>  Region codes include provincial codes for China and country codes for all countries.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the live stream that you want to prefetch.
